revised_title: Investigation of Atmospheric Electrical Variations at Sunrise and Sunset
tldr: This study investigates the variations in atmospheric electrical quantities, such as conductivity, electric charges, and potential gradients, during sunrise and sunset. The researchers used various instruments to collect data at Kew Observatory and Eskdalemuir. The results show a decrease in all electrical quantities after sunset and a slight increase after sunrise. The study also discusses the potential impact of these findings on wireless transmission phenomena.
